author: Isaac Rabinovitch
comment: Works well when I need to find my phone. A ton of weird features that I have no desire to explore.

author: Andrej Frece
comment: Great app. Wear watch can alarm vibrate when bluetooth connection with phone terminates, you can also find phone with one click on wear watch - phone can alarm vibrate rings sound light a fleslight or alltogether. Great app!

author: Erich Schmidt
comment: Works well if you only need to find the phone, fails if you need alerts that you left your phone behind.  If the watch is also connected to Wi-Fi, turning off Bluetooth on the phone (as a proxy for going far enough from the phone) doesn't completely sever the connection to the watch, so the watch doesn't alert that it's no longer directly connected to the phone.

author: Yummo Can
comment: It is super unreliable. At least once a day it goes off when I'm sitting next to my phone.

author: Glenn Mosdall
comment: Used to love this app, but apparently it can not be installed on my Ticwatch (Android Wear 2), so it's pretty much useless now

author: Jamie Bally
comment: I have turned off the left phone alerts and just use it as an alternative to the Apple watch 'ping' phone

author: Ryle Mokoena
comment: On disconnect the watch doesnt alert.. Can I have my refund. Just purchased pro now?

author: John Vettel
comment: Takes too long to let me know that I don't have my phone with me.

author: Charalampos Penlidis
comment: The app works, Sometimes fails to response quickly but I believe that my watch is to blame (TagHeuer Connected)

author: Erik Muench
comment: Works great, does what I want it to, which is to let me know when the phone is out of bt range.

author: Daphne Huynh
comment: Very handy. I don't have to ask my kids to find my phone anymore :)

author: Jeremy Smith
comment: Nice app but NEEDS Google Assistant and Alexa integration. Or at lease IFTTT.

author: Matthew Lucas
comment: This app never goes off when watch and phone are separated .

author: Roshni Jain
comment: Dont install this app

author: Marc Stone
comment: Agree with Eric Schmidt

author: Wareeporn Sittichaisrichart
comment: Good

author: Thomas Litland
comment: Awesome

author: sharp red
comment: Using moto360. Old version of this apps works very well. Now the apps only warn me when I move more than 1 minutes away. Too late. My phone already gone.
title: Last time good, not now

author: Lex J
comment: Let's me know when I've gone too far from my phone 100% but that's it. Doesn't always work to help me find my phone. phone rings or vibrates 1/10. Usually says phone is out of reach even if I'm in the same room. I have 1st gen moto 360
title: Wish it worked better

author: Tim Claridge
comment: Dev added this feature. 5 stars now.   Old review: There needs to be a configurable timer for when it alerts. If my Bluetooth disconnects for a second then it alerts me then it reconnects a second later...
title: Works well

author: Dwayne Barnett
comment: On my Nexus 4 I would get an immediate notification when phone was out of range. Now with new Nexus 5X I don't get a notification I'm out of range on my Smart Watch until I move my wrist and wake display!
title: Nexus 5X and Sony Smart Watch 3

author: Omar Sueque
comment: This application is very important and helpful please fix those bugs. Application works on a Samsung Gear Live Software version 5.0.1 but tap to find button do not work on smartwatch Samsung Gear Live Software version 5.0.1 I'm using app pay version on LG G4 smartphone with android version 6.0 build number MRA58K.  Also disconnection alarms should be repeated several times or until the user dismiss, please add those options and you have 5 starts.

author: Lex Leonard
comment: Unreliable. No vibrations when the phone gets disconnected and it even lets you try to "find your phone" when Android Wear clearly shows that the phone is not connected in the first place.

author: Jacques Moise
comment: I've had my moto 360 for well over a year and this app was always dependable. But as of recently I get don't receive any notifications that I left my phone....what happened? I actually have several other apps that have find my phone features but this one vibrates the phone as well as ringing it...but just for the sake of reliability I'm debating switching over.
title: What happened?

author: Imran Hakro
comment: It used to awesome app,  but now it's total failure. It doesn't notify on disconnect,  until i move my wrist to wake the display.
title: Used to be awsome,  but total junk now

author: LaTosha Davis
comment: This app was once a life saver with my Asus Zen2, now it just disconnects constantly even when I'm holding my phone.  I had to uninstall it because it was draining my watch battery.
title: Keeps disconnecting draining my watch battery

author: Gordy Pingel
comment: This has saved me from leaving my phone in random places more than I'd like to admit.  It also works amazing as a way to find my phone when it is lost.  Get it now!  You will not regret it.
title: Best Essential App for Android Wear!!!

author: Eli Fulton
comment: This app is always saying I left my phone (10 times a day or more) when it's right in my pocket inches from my watch....  Please fix this.... I have a Galaxy s7 and Huawei watch.
title: Very unreliable

author: Jenova Izq
comment: I love this and the features when is far away and when I love my phone I can find it fast. I bought it to support the developer it had help me a lot when sometimes I left my phone at work, thanks so much for a awesome app developer.
title: Love it and is VERY USEFUL.

author: Deepak S
comment: I don't get an alert when my LG watch urbane disconnects from my Note 4 when the watch display is set to auto-off.
title: Disconnect alert problem!

author: Bessie Douvi
comment: It does not work all the time. Especially when the phone runs specific apps the phone does not ring.
title: Does not work

author: Kyle W
comment: Just like the title. Sometimes at least half the time it won't work.  I will go as far as uninstall And reinstall it.
title: Great when it works.

author: Fernando Scelzo
comment: I can disconnect my phone or get away from it. Nothing
title: Doesn't work

author: David Donnelly
comment: Used to work well, but now only helps find phone if still connected. If phone is out of range, moving back does not reconnect phone!

author: Tony Hall
comment: I absolutely loved this app, until somehow I start to get left phone notifications 10 times a day when the phone is still connected... What gives?
title: What the hell happened?

author: Darrel Froman
comment: I like this app. It works fine for the options it has. I just wish that it had a alarm function on the watch because I don't always notice the vibration on my watch and my watch has a speaker.

author: Alex Gavenus
comment: Purchased the pro version. I re-downloaded this today because I noticed the factory version does absolutely nothing now. This app works as expected.
title: Works great

author: Michael Otto
comment: If this was the only feature on my watch, I would still where it all the time. This is the best and most used app on my Moto 360!
title: Lovin it!

author: Terry Brockelman
comment: No response back from the developer on connection issues. Paid  a 1.99 to much it notifies me that my phone is lost when in fact it is 12 inches a way from my watch.

author: Bushovsky Igor
comment: This app asks me to buy their app again (Pro) version when I've reinstalled new firmware. Developers do something with it
